Name: Limited Lifetime Corp
About the game: Limited Lifetime Corp is a day by day management sim. Harvest Resources Deploy your excavators to multiple regions to gather resources. As your LLC grows, you can expand to many more regions. Beware the Local Fauna Keep an eye on the shifting sands for any unwanted guests. You can't be everywhere, so you can deploy automated lookouts to warn of you impending dangers, both real and imaginary. Profit At the end of the day, you receive the fruits of your labor. You can purchase more machines, upgrade them, and purchase more land rights. But be warned, there are those jealous of your profits. How Long Can Your LLC Survive?
